1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ojtak in sic'libil, cax max ak' bey a c'ul win.</t>
2: <t>Tz'akanc'al ojtaknen el masanil tzet chi wunej; yin ayoktoc'al cax chojtaknen el tzet ok in na'.</t>
3: <t>Ojtakxa bay chin ec'jabi, c'al bay chin xewi; cax ojtak masanil tzet chi el wuneni.</t>
4: <t>Toltax c'amto chin na' tzet ok wala', axa pax ach Mamin, ojtakxa.</t>
5: <t>Oyan ach oc masanil winlak, cax ayajtok a k'ab wiban.</t>
6: <t>C'ayubtakxac'al yoc a jelanil ti'; caw c'am chi nachaj el wuj; miman yelapnok, cax chi c'ayaj in c'ul yuj.</t>
7: <pb/><t>¿Baytowal ok ca welaj bay Espíritu? ¿Baytowal ok ca welaj a satak?</t>
8: <t>Ta chin toj satcan tu', a tu' ayach ec'ok; ta chin aycantok yulak c'ul tx'otx' tx'otx', ayach c'apax ach ec' bay tu'.</t>
9: <t>Ta chin toj sataktok bay chi ajol c'u, ma chin toj cajay bay a' mar bay yayob c'u,</t>
10: <t>palta chic'al apni oc a k'ab win bay tu'. Majton in beklay el yuj a watx' k'ab.</t>
11: <t>Ta chin na' in c'uban el in ba bay k'ekk'inal, ta chin k'an q'uexpoj oc c'ualil yin ak'balil bay ayin ec' ti',</t>
12: <t>a jun ak'balil tu', maj je' in is c'uban el a satak; a k'ekk'inal, lajan yetok sakk'inal a satak. C'am q'uexanil ak'balil yul a sat, yujtol sakk'inalc'al el masanil.</t>
13: <pb/><t>Ach ton wal max a watx'nej masanil yetbeyom in mimanil. Ach max in a watx'nej yin in txutx.</t>
14: <t>Chi wal watx' k'anej ayach, yujtol ayin oc yin ijinakc'ulal, yujtol c'ayubtakxac'al tzet chonej. Chixa nachaj el jun ti' wuj sic'libil.</t>
15: <t>A yet max yion yip ch'ib in mimanil, man ebebilok el yul a sat, mawal yet max in watx'ji el yin man txequelok yin in txutx.</t>
16: <t>Max yil a sat in mimanil yet c'amto chin alji. Masanil bisil c'ual in k'inal, tz'ib yayji yul a libro yet c'amto junok c'ual chi wila'.</t>
17: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, c'am chi nachaj el a nabal wuj; c'am lajubal bisil.</t>
18: <t>Ta chin oc ijan in bisoni, ec'ban bisil yintak ch'en arena. A yet ok el in wayan, ayinc'al ec' a satak.</t>
19: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, ican el is k'inal eb unem yobtakil, cax najat checan el eb mak'om cam anima in c'atan.</t>
20: <t>Yujtol yob tzet chi yal eb ajc'ul en, chach yak' binaj eb yin yobal.</t>
21: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, chin cak eb chach cakoni, cax c'am chi wochej eb ajc'ul oc en.</t>
22: <t>C'am chi wochej eb yin junelnej, yujtol ajc'ul eb win waloni.</t>
23: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, ak' bey a c'ul yin wanimail, il c'apax oc in nabal.</t>
24: <t>Ila', tatol lanan in toj yin yob beybalej, cax chin ekbantok yul beal k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
